Title: Good Grief
Plot: Lucille hires a bounty hunter, Ice, to find George Sr., who may be closer than everyone thinks. Gob tries to pull off an elaborate illusion, Maeby tries to set Lindsay up with Ice, and Michael tries to mend George Michael's broken relationship.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Malik Yoba, Abraham Higginbotham, Ben Stiller, Jason Aaron Tinero
